T02TD2742E:127b-0: @127b * // thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2742E:127b-1: srid gsum gtso bo zhi ba'i lha //
T02TD2742E:127b-2: thugs rjes mi bsnyel shes rab kyis //
T02TD2742E:128a-3: gsum la skyabs song sems bskyed pas //
T02TD2742E:128a-4: byams sogs tshad med legs sbyangs shing //
T02TD2742E:128a-5: brtse chen ye shes snying gi mes //
T02TD2742E:128a-6: lus can sgrib pa'i bung shing bsreg / rnam lnga byang chub las 'khrungs sku //
T02TD2742E:128a-7: gzhon nu dkar mdzes phun tshogs tshul //
T02TD2742E:128a-8: mchog sbyin padmo g-yas dang g-yon //
T02TD2742E:128a-9: 'od dpag med pa'i dbu brgyan bsgom //
T02TD2742E:128a-11: lte bar rang sems h'um yig ni //
T02TD2742E:128a-13: bskor ba'i dag gis sa gsum sbyang /
T02TD2742E:128a-14: me long gzugs dang brag ca'i sgra //
T02TD2742E:128a-15: mkha' 'dra dag dang dri med dang //
T02TD2742E:128a-16: ye shes phrin las sbyar ba yi //
T02TD2742E:128a-18: rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
